EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: Lunch & Learn London
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/lunch-and-learn/london]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Lunch & Learn in London. Please see event details below:
Date: 15 September 2016 {{my.Save the Date:default=Save the Date!}} Time: 12:30 - 1:30 PM Location: Pivotal, The Warehouse, 211 Old Street, 2nd Floor, London EC1V 9NR
We look forward to meeting you soon!
The Pivotal Team
